mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `budget_data` ( `budget_data_id`, `userId`, `apply_dept_id`, `apply_dept_name`, `applyTime`, `flowid`, `stepid`, `status`, `budget_kind`, `del`, filename, fileurl, gl_dept_id, gl_dept_name, `create_time`, `update_time` ) VALUES ( #{budgetData.budgetDataId}, #{budgetData.userId}, #{budgetData.applyDeptId}, #{budgetData.applyDeptName}, now(), #{budgetData.flowid}, #{budgetData.stepid}, 0, #{budgetData.budgetKind}, 0, #{budgetData.fileName}, #{budgetData.fileUrl}, #{budgetData.glDeptId}, #{budgetData.glDeptName}, now(), now());
mapper.select:
SELECT concat (dict.k," ",dict.val) as typeName,
FROM budget_data AS d LEFT JOIN budget_data_item AS item ON d.budget_data_id = item.budget_data_id left join t_dict as dict on dict.k = item.budget_type WHERE d.id = #{params.id} and dict.type = "budgetType" ORDER BY item.create_time DESC limit #{offset}, #{limit}
